text: William Marcus Paul Stewart (n√© Tubbs; born 8 November 1972) is an English former professional footballer. He played as a forward from 1991 until 2011. On 8 September 2022, Stewart was diagnosed with motor neurone disease. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Bristol Rovers F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Ipswich Town F.C. players Category:Premier League players Category:Preston North End F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Bristol Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players
title: Marcus Stewart
